name: rqm
description: Requirements Management in Code - A polyglot monorepo

scripts.test:go: test -d go-cli/go.mod && cd go-cli && go test ./... || echo 'Go CLI not yet initialized'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:rust && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:go: test -d go-cli/go.mod && cd go-cli && golangci-lint run || echo 'Go CLI not yet initialized'
scripts.format: npm run format:rust && npm run format:prettier
scripts.format:go: test -d go-cli/go.mod && cd go-cli && gofmt -w . || echo 'Go CLI not yet initialized'
